attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the programe Lost Land of the Jaguar on BBC1 recently I was saddened to hear that in order to save the rainforest in Guyana the government had offered the UK the chance to buy carbon credits to assist with economic developement and to prevent logging to make necessary money and therefore destroy the rainforest.  Will the UK support Guyana?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
